# IfcConversionUnitInformation.LongStringPrefix method

Converts the given SI prefix to its corresponding long string (e.g. kilo for KILO)

```csharp
public static string LongStringPrefix(SiPrefix prefix)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| prefix | the SI prefix |

## Return Value

the associated short string prefix (e.g. kilo, mimmi, deka)
